assets: Phaidon and Art Space combined business

analysis.purpose: To provide financial calculations and tax savings estimates for a business combination and sale
analysis.significance: Shows detailed financial planning and tax strategy discussions involving substantial amounts of money

tax 3.8%. city and state 12% total aprox 43 %. tax rate. savings 38.7 - 44 m

analysis.summary: Jeffrey Epstein emails Melanie SpineIla with detailed financial calculations for Phaidon and Art Space, estimating a combined basis of $106 million, potential sale price of $8-15 million, resulting in $90-98 million loss, and tax savings of $38.7-44 million at approximately 43% tax rate.
